name: INTO THE CTHULHU MYTHOLOGY
description:
Those who came to this land with their own stories...
Why did they come here
What lies at the end of that journey?

Features of the game

Create a powerful deck using the synergy of cards!
There are various public/private cards.


Four traits that will maximize the synergy of your deck.
Feel free to choose according to the strategy you have envisioned!

Level up strategically!
The character's stats increase
Some of your stamina and mental strength are restored.

Roguelite
Did you lose because the game was difficult?
Don't worry and try again!
When you try again, you start receiving an additional advantage.

Randomness
Different types of maps, monsters with their own characteristics, and bosses.
Decorate your deck harmoniously with cards that change in each edition!
Events in your favor or against you.
Various potions to help in battle!

Map

Go completely on the route you want!
Where is the shelter where you can escape in an emergency?
However, you should always consider your ability to act.
If you move to a state with 0 Action, you take damage from HP and Spirit.

Combat

Monsters that get stronger as you move the map...
Catch bosses and elites to change and strengthen your cards.
Powerful cards that will change the face of battle!
Artifacts with very different effects.
Some Artifacts are great for specific maps.

Defeat them and reach the end.
What awaits there?
